short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Testing API safely and quickly with Lightning API Tester.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever tried to test API safely and quickly, but it took a long time because you had to turn on the desktop app or website?
Or have you ever had an API leak even though you only tested the API on a desktop app or website that tests the API?
Let me introduce this Chrome Extension app for you.
Lightning API Tester helps you test API on Chrome more safely and quickly.
Lightning API Tester is safe because it sends requests directly from Chrome to API without going through our server.
